intro: Bulbostylis cioniana, commonly known as the slender spike-rush, is a species of flowering plant in the family Cyperaceae. It is a perennial herb characterized by its slender, grass-like stems and small, inconspicuous flowers arranged in spike-like clusters. Native to tropical and subtropical regions, this plant typically grows in wetlands, marshes, and other moist habitats. Its rhizomatous growth habit allows it to spread and form dense colonies. The plant plays a role in stabilizing soil and providing habitat for various microorganisms and invertebrates.
